description: Versatility meets durability in the Ribelle® Run XT, intended for rugged terrain when extra support and protection is needed. A full perimeter rand and an extended toe wrap provide added protection, while the recycled fabric upper features TPU overlays for foot security and stability. The PRESA® outsole with its enhanced heel brake delivers outstanding traction and confidence on any trail.
name: Scarpa Ribelle Run XT - Mens
